tool_description: Analyzes passenger demand patterns from ridership data, demographic information, and travel surveys to identify high-demand corridors and peak travel times.

ridership_data_source.description: Path or identifier for ridership data (fare card, survey, mobile data)

demographic_data.description: Path to demographic and land use data

error_messages: Invalid date range: analysis_period_end must be after analysis_period_start and both must be valid ISO 8601 dates.
Data source not accessible: Check that ridership_data_source path exists and is readable.
Insufficient data quality: Ridership data must contain at least origin, destination, and timestamp information.
Invalid time resolution: Use one of [15min, 30min, 1hour] for time_resolution parameter.
usage: Provide ridership data source and analysis time period. Optionally include demographic data for enhanced analysis. Tool returns demand patterns by location, time, and direction.

peak_hours.description: List of peak travel time periods

high_demand_corridors.description: Geographic corridors with highest travel demand
